snippet: MOROFF--Libby. Cherished friend and advisor, stalwart activist for social justice. With a clear moral center, she consistently gave politics a good name. From many of us privileged to work closely with her, deepest condolences to Saul, Diane, Margaret, Noah and Sadie. Ruth W. Messinger 1/3
lead_paragraph: MOROFF--Libby. Cherished friend and advisor, stalwart activist for social justice. With a clear moral center, she consistently gave politics a good name. From many of us privileged to work closely with her, deepest condolences to Saul, Diane, Margaret, Noah and Sadie. Ruth W. Messinger 1/3
